name: Suspicious Listing of Network Connections
description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the network.
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt].*/ OR (process.command_line:/.*[Nn][Ee][Tt]\ .*/ AND (process.command_line:(/.*\ [Uu][Ss][Ee]/ OR /.*\ [Ss][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]/) OR process.command_line:(/.*\ [Uu][Ss][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Ss][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\ .*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*netstat* OR (process.command_line:*net\ * AND (process.command_line:(*\ use OR *\ sessions) OR process.command_line:(*\ use\ * OR *\ sessions\ *))))`
